Interface IAuthenticationController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AAuthenticationController, AuthenticationController
public interface IAuthenticationController
Interface for Authentication Controller in the BTO Management System. Defines methods for user authentication and account management.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      The authenticated user if successful, null otherwise

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String nric, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC
      oldPassword - The user's current password
      newPassword - The user's new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise

    • validateNRICFormat

      boolean validateNRICFormat(String nric)
      Validates the format of an NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC format is valid, false otherwise

    • getUserByNRIC

      User getUserByNRIC(String nric)
      Gets a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      The user if found, null otherwise

    • getApplicantByNRIC

      Applicant getApplicantByNRIC(String nric)
      Gets an applicant by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant to retrieve
      Returns:
      The applicant if found, null otherwise

    • getOfficerByNRIC

      HDBOfficer getOfficerByNRIC(String nric)
      Gets an HDB officer by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the officer to retrieve
      Returns:
      The officer if found, null otherwise

    • getManagerByNRIC

      HDBManager getManagerByNRIC(String nric)
      Gets an HDB manager by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the manager to retrieve
      Returns:
      The manager if found, null otherwise

    • getUserRole

      UserRole getUserRole(String nric)
      Gets the role of a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user
      Returns:
      The user's role, or null if the user is not found

    • loadUserData

      boolean loadUserData(String filePath)
      Loads user data from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing user data
      Returns:
      true if the data was successfully loaded, false otherwise

    • saveUserData

      boolean saveUserData(String filePath)
      Saves user data to a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to save the user data to
      Returns:
      true if the data was successfully saved, false otherwise
